directions.text: In a small bowl whisk together the butter, vinegar, ¼ cup cajun seasoning, garlic powder, and onion powder.
Use a meat injecting syringe to inject bowl contents into various spots of the chicken.
Rub the chicken all over with a ½ cup olive oil and a generous layer of cajon seasoning.
Discard half of the beer and put the can in the chicken's cavity and set it upright.
Make a mop by the pouring cider and ½ cup olive oil into a spray bottle.
Smoke chicken for about 3 hours until it reaches 165°
Add Applewood chips every 30 mins up to an hour.
Spray chicken with the mop every 30 minutes.
